content: the chubby bunny is a cute and quick project that is perfect for easter baskets or to simply use up some left-over blanket yarn hooks 8 mm 3 5 mm making the eyes 5 5 mm or large yarn needle for attaching ears and tail yarn 75 yards color a main color super bulky gauge 6 yarn 2 yards color b tail color super bulky gauge 6 yarn 3 yards black medium weight yarn eyes & nose 1 yard white medium weight yarn highlights additional sewing needle scissors 1 pair black or brown nylons for stuffing the fiber fill into fabric pins for assembling 1 12 oz bag of fiber fill
